comments:
Currently, it seems that the libswt-awt-XXXX.so library is not being
built for Solaris/Motif.  If possible, this should be included in the
builds.

I'm also still having this problem on Mac OS X when trying to load the metrics plugin.  I'm using java 1.5 and eclipse 3.1.  See Stack trace below...

Your problem is no related to this bug.  Please file a new bug including your
stack trace.
FYI, in the Eclipse 3.3 stream the Launcher (eclipse exe) is missing for Solaris Motif. I filed bug 185734 to track this. Anybody interested in Solaris Motif may want to watch this.
